name: J.C. Herhous: DeathMatch Wad
description: This is my old house. If you make a mess, clean it up. I love playing house wads the best. There aren't that many i've found so i made my own. I apologize for the on/off light switches that don't work. You'll have to play JCHOUSE.WAD, which is the original Doom ][ version. Please e-mail me w/ any comments!
